summary: Smart Placement Ecosystem - AI-powered placement platform with a responsive landing page featuring navbar, hero, about, how-it-works, statistics, contact, and footer sections built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
architectural_notes: Built with React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
Dark theme using gray-950/gray-900 backgrounds with purple/cyan gradient accents
Sticky navbar with scroll-triggered background change and mobile hamburger menu
Statistics section uses static data; planned to connect to backend APIs later
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract AI neural network dark gradient hero background with glowing teal and cyan node connections on a deep navy background (hero-bg.dim_1440x800.png)
- Minimal flat logo mark for 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' â€” a stylized 'S' or abstract node-graph icon in teal and white on transparent background (spe-logo.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Build a sticky responsive Navbar with the 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' logo, navigation links (Home, About, How It Works, Contact), Login and Register buttons, a mobile hamburger menu toggle, and a background color change on scroll.

Build a Hero Section with the headline 'AI-Powered Smart Placement Platform', a short descriptive subtitle explaining the platform's purpose, and two call-to-action buttons: 'Get Started' and 'Login'.
Build an About Section that explains the problem with traditional placement systems, how the AI-based system improves job matching, and why it is useful for both students and recruiters.

Build a 'How It Works' Section displaying 4 sequential steps as cards: (1) Student uploads resume, (2) AI analyzes skills, (3) System matches relevant jobs, (4) Recruiter shortlists candidates. Each step should have a step number, icon or visual indicator, title, and short description.

Build a Statistics Section displaying four static platform metrics: total number of students, number of partner companies, total applications submitted, and placement success rate. Display these as visually prominent stat cards.
Build a Contact Section with a section heading, a brief contact invite message, and basic contact details (email address and/or a simple contact form placeholder).
Build a Footer with quick navigation links (Home, About, How It Works, Contact), basic contact information, and the 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' brand name.

Ensure the entire landing page is fully responsive: the navbar collapses to a hamburger menu on mobile, all sections stack vertically on small screens, and text, buttons, and cards adapt appropriately to desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints using Tailwind CSS responsive utilities.

Apply a cohesive modern SaaS visual theme with a dark-to-rich gradient palette (e.g., deep navy to teal or dark slate to emerald), clean typography, generous spacing, card-based component structure, and subtle gradient accents on buttons and section backgrounds. The design should feel appropriate for an AI-powered enterprise platform.
Render the generated hero background image and logo as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the Hero Section and Navbar respectively.
